model.poem
Class TQConnection

java.lang.Object
  model.poem.TQConnection

public class TQConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Trip Queue Connection

This class is the connection with the cargo database that handles the interaction between the Officer view and the actual simulator. It loads what happens in the simulator, be it arrivals or events that affect the officer view, and uploads the relevant data to the truck queue database under the session id for each session

Version:
April 2010
Author:
Jorge Alexis Hernandez
